Text.Language: }cwoun je n~yok oua~gayoc: n~refsenh/t ouoh n~na/t: a~ripameui~ qen peknai: sa e~neh n~te nie~neh:
I know that You are good, compassionate, and merciful. Remember me in Your mercy, forever and ever.

}twbh m~mok w~ Pa[oic I/couc m~percohi m~moi qen pekjwnt oude on qen pekm~bon m~per] c~bw n~tametate~mi:
I ask You, O My Lord Jesus, do not rebuke me with Your anger, nor reprove my ignorance with Your wrath.

All/louia: all/louia: all/louia. Pi,~rictoc afern/cteuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: n~h~me n~e~hoou nem h~me n~e~jwrh: nai nan kata peknis] n~nai:
Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia. Christ fasted for us: forty days and forty nights. Have mercy on us according to Your great mercy.
